QuestData.Title: Explosive Evidence
QuestData.Description: I must ask you to do one more thing for me, $n.$B$BThe personal effects on this ship cannot be left for others to find. We'll have to destroy it.$B$BI cobbled together some Makeshift Dynamite from the scraps you brought me.$B$BPlace the dynamite anywhere on the ship, but take care not to put them too close together.$B$BThey might be...uh...a little unwieldy, so you should spread them out in case of premature detonation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant 4 Makeshift Dynamite near the sunken ship at Sapphire's End. Makeshift Dynamite must be placed at least 10 yards apart.
